subject: Swimming
Testosterone
Steroids
lead_paragraph: On the day that Michael Phelps matched Ian Thorpe’s record of six gold medals, a French newspaper reported that a drug test Thorpe underwent last May has produced curious results.
snippet: On the day that Michael Phelps matched Ian Thorpe’s record of six gold medals, a French newspaper reported that a drug test Thorpe underwent last May has produced curious results.
